abstract: Boston Celtics co-owner Steve Pagliuca is replacing construction magnate John Fish as head of committee spearheading campaign to bring 2024 Olympics to Boston.
lead_paragraph: The group leading the bid to bring the 2024 Olympics to Boston is shaking up its management.

headline.main: New Leader of Boston Bid for 2024 Olympics
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Olympics; New Leader of Boston Bid

snippet: The group leading the bid to bring the 2024 Olympics to Boston is shaking up its management.
